data.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
data.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.

relatedRecords.name: DevRel/Asia 2020
relatedRecords.description: DevRel/Asia 2020 is online/virtual conference that is target on Asia pacific. We share great experiences about developer relations, developer experiences, developer marketing and developer communities.
